attributes.action: call for MPs second housing allowance to be stopped.And a house to be bought on their behalf in the area they represent. This will then be allocated to MP succeeding them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of running this house will be met by the tax payer.Food and luxuries would have to be met by the MP. so allowances would no longer be needed. And will in the long run save the tax payer hundreds & hundreds of thousands of pounds and would be a investment for the tax payer at the end of the day.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
